game.name: Barbie Glam Queen
game.description:
Barbie is ready to do something she is known for. She never misses a chance that could help make her shine. Today she has participated in the biggest beauty contest of the town. The problem is that she is pretty confused how to choose an outfit that can give her a look between a casual and an elegant style. Can you help her to solve out this confusion? If yes, join Barbie Glam Queen and be prepared to create an extremely awesome glam style look.

Remember this blonde beauty is passionate about the glam and chic. Whether you choose something elegant or something casual for the lady, she knows how to shine her look with her matchless imagination and creativity skills. Check out her wardrobe and mix and match as many various outfit options as you can to come up with a unique look in this brand new girls game! Make sure to make her look from head to toe in a glam style.

Choose a blue cropped blouse with a metallic pleated skirt, or a pink high waist skirt covered in sequins with a white blouse with ruffled sleeves! Use the colourful ombres to dye her hair and do not forget to accessorize it with a pair of matching sunglasses, white moon earrings, pearls around her neck, and a golden designer bag. A lovely gown with glitter and embroidery will help to give her an elegant look. Pair it up with precious jewelry, retro curls and a glittery makeup in this HTML5 dressing game!
